class.name: org.n52.sos.ds.hibernate.entities.ValidProcedureTime
class.comment: Table to store procedure descriptions which were inserted or updated via the transactional Profile. Mapping file: mapping/transactionl/ValidProcedureTime.hbm.xml

column.name: procedureId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related procedure. Contains "procedure".procedureid

column.name: procedureDescriptionFormatId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related procedureDescriptionFormat. Contains "procedureDescriptionFormat".procedureDescriptionFormatid

column.name: startTime
column.comment: Timestamp since this procedure description is valid

column.name: endTime
column.comment: Timestamp since this procedure description is invalid
